ksdk:manifest.name: MIMXRT1051xxxxB
ksdk:manifest.brief: This is SDK version 2.5.0 manifest file. It describes the content of the MIMXRT1051xxxxB and additional settings for tools that support SDK version 2.5.0

board.name: EVKB-IMXRT1050
board.description: IMXRT1050-EVKB: EVK Development Platform for i.MX MIMXRT1052 and MIMXRT1051 MCUs

specific.content: The NXP IMXRT1050-EVKB is a development board for the i.MX MIMXRT1052 and MIMXRT1051 600 MHz 32-bit ARM® Cortex®-M7 MCUs.

board.name: EVKB-IMXRT1050-AGM01
board.description: /nSensor Toolbox Development Platform for FXAS21002C and FXOS8700C 9-Axis Solution/n

specific.content:
EVKB-MIMXRT1050 with FRDM-STBC-AGM01 Custom Kit (FRDM-STBC-AGM01 Sensor Shield Development Board with EVKB-MIMXRT1050 Board):
  • FRDM-STBC-AGM01 Sensor Shield board is a sensor expansion board enabling NXP’s 9-axis solution (FXAS21002C 3-Axis Gyroscope with FXOS8700CQ 3-Axis Accelerometer + 3-Axis Magnetometer).

board.name: EVKB-IMXRT1050-OM13588
board.description: /nUSB Type-C Shield Board for Kinetis Freedom Board/n

specific.content: /nThe USB Type-C shield board combined with a Kinetis Power Delivery SDK allows a system designer to tether a USB Type-C connector to any Kinetis development platform./n

board.name: EVKB-IMXRT1050-OM13790HOST
board.description: /nUSB Type-C Shield Board for Kinetis Freedom Board/n

specific.content: /nThe USB Type-C shield board combined with a Kinetis Power Delivery SDK allows a system designer to tether a USB Type-C connector to any Kinetis development platform./n

device.name: MIMXRT1052
device.description: MIMXRT1052: i.MX® MIMXRT1052 600MHz, 512KB SRAM Microcontrollers (MCUs) based on ARM® Cortex®-M7 Core

specific.content: The MIMXRT1052 are ARM Cortex-M7 based microcontrollers for embedded applications.

device.name: MIMXRT1051
device.description: MIMXRT1051: i.MX® MIMXRT1051 600MHz, 512KB SRAM Microcontrollers (MCUs) based on ARM® Cortex®-7 Core

specific.content: The MIMXRT1051 are ARM Cortex-M7 based microcontrollers for embedded applications.
